[3] 13C enrichment of breath was determined by isotope ratio mass spectrometry; a rise in13C enrichment of more than 66.0 ppm above fasting baseline (relative to a Pee Dee Belemnite (PDB) standard) was regarded as diagnostic of H pyloriinfection.
